name: Space Saviour (LeMonke Studio)
description:
Save the universe from the evil invaders that have brought entire civilizations to their knees! Can you destroy all the enemies and ultimately be the saviour everyone needed? Find out in this short yet exhilarating retro action game!

Space Saviour is a 2D shoot 'em up action game with original soundtracks and has a retro feel to it. Explore the 15 different unique levels and ultimately try to slay the boss WorldSlayer 3000. Good luck ;). 

The game is completed with few known minor issues but overall the gameplay is nearly perfected. Enjoy!
